content: उषस् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dawn, morning; प्रदीपार्चिरिवाषेसि <ls>R. 12. 1</ls>; उषसि उत्थाय rising at day-break. {@--2@} Morning light; <ab>cf.</ab> Aurora; (personified as the daughter of heaven and sister of the Ādityas). {@--3@} The deity that presides over the morning and evening twilights (used in dual); उषसौ or उषासौ. {@--4@} The outer passage of the ear. {@--5@} The Malaya range. --सी The end of the day, evening twilight.
